overview:
otobant.com is an online classifieds and shopping platform for cars and automotive services. Registration and posting listings are free of charge.

otobant.com, a leading actor in the Internet sector in Istanbul, is the largest classifieds platform in Turkey with its effective infrastructure and comprehensive advertising system.
